name: 'Star Trek' Vulcans Quiz | 'Star Trek' - Species and Planets | 10 Questions

questions.text: TOS ep 'Amok Time': What was Spock's wife's name?

questions.explanation:
green.

	Because it contains copper-based instead of iron-based hemoglobin.

questions.text: "The Search for Spock": how many actors played Spock in this movie, not including vocals and stunt doubles?
questions.explanation:
5.

	Spock's body was reborn after landing on the Genesis planet. He was shown growing up from boyhood to adulthood. He was played by Carl Steven (age 9), Vadia Potenza (age 13), Stephen Manley (age 17), Joe W. Davis (age 25), and Leonard Nimoy (adult).

Sybok.

	As seen in 'Star Trek V: The Final Frontier' (played by Laurence Luckinbill). Saavik was the female lieutenant seen in Star Trek II, III, and IV (played by Kirstie Alley (II) and Robin Curtis (III, IV)). Stonn was T'Pring's preferred mate (played by Lawrence Montaigne). Surak was the founder of the Vulcan logical lifestyle (played by Barry Atwater).

questions.text: DS9 ep 'Take Me Out to the Holosuite': Who was Capt. Sisko's Vulcan nemesis?
questions.explanation:
Solok.

	Played by Lou Wagner. Sarek was Spock's father (Mark Lenard). Selar was a doctor on the Enterprise-D (Suzie Plakson).

questions.text: Which of these actors has played two different Vulcans?
questions.explanation:
Alexander Enberg.

	He played Taurik in TNG ep 'Lower Decks' and Vorik in several Voyager episodes. Wagner played Captain {Solok;} coincidentally he played a Ferengi named Solok in TNG ep 'Chain of Command'. Mark Lenard played Sarek and a Romulan Commander (TOS ep 'Balance of Terror'). Judith Anderson played the Vulcan High Priestess in 'Star Trek III: The Search for Spock'.

questions.text: How is the Vulcan Death Grip performed?
options: pinch the shoulder like the stun grip, only harder
grasp one hand around the face
grasp nose between index and middle fingers
questions.explanation:
doesn't exist.

	Trick question. In TOS ep 'The Enterprise Incident', Spock says he's given Kirk the VDG by gripping Kirk's face with one hand. This is actually a mind meld trick that just put Kirk in a death-like state. He later revived and then infiltrated the Romulan ship to steal the cloaking device.

questions.text: How often do Vulcans males need to mate?
questions.explanation:
every 7 years.

	They enter a state called pon farr, where their logic disappears and they become violent in their attempts to either return to their wives or find a suitable mate.

questions.text: 'Star Trek: The Motion Picture': what happens to LCDR Sonak, the initial science officer of the Enterprise?
questions.explanation:
killed in transporter mishap.

	Sadly for him, Kirk wanted a Vulcan science officer. Played by Jon Rashad Kamal.

questions.text: Besides the actors in 'The Search for Spock', who else has portrayed Spock in canonical productions of 'Star Trek'?
questions.explanation:
Billy Simpson.

	He provided the voice of young Spock in TAS episode 'Yesteryear'.
